Description.Text: Tiara Termal is a 4-star superior hotel offering elegant accommodation and plush facilities within easy reach of central Bursa. Highlights include a spa, Mediterranean restaurant and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is located in Cekirge, which is known for its many spas. Nearby places of interest include the Ataturk Museum, Uludag National Park, the city walls and Mudanya beach. Sirameseler Istasyonu metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Bursa destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a grey facade. Facilities include a spacious indoor swimming pool with thermal water enriched with minerals. After a relaxing swim, guests can head to the Jacuzzis, Turkish baths, steam rooms and sauna. Massages are available upon request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Tivona restaurant offers Turkish and other Mediterranean cuisine including Italian. Standard rooms are 17-21sqm and benefit from an elegant decor. Amenities include a mini-bar, safe, flat-screen satellite/cable TV and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower with thermal water. Free parking is possible onsite.
